00056 /** 
00057  * @brief Constructor. Registers the objects we know how to create and how
00058  * they describe themselves.
00059  */    
00060 QuantMethodFactory::QuantMethodFactory(enum QuantType type) {
00061         m_PrecompFeatureEffects = NULL;
00062         m_iFeatureEffectSize = 0;
00063   if(type == Expression) {
00064     // Plier
00065     SelfDoc doc = QuantPlier::explainSelf();
00066     registerMethod(doc, &QuantPlier::newObject);
00067 
00068     // Sea
00069     doc = QuantSea::explainSelf();
00070     registerMethod(doc, &QuantSea::newObject);
00071 
00072     // IterPlier
00073     doc = QuantIterPlier::explainSelf();
00074     registerMethod(doc, &QuantIterPlier::newObject);
00075 
00076     // Rma
00077     doc = QuantRma::explainSelf();
00078     registerMethod(doc, &QuantRma::newObject);
00079 
00080     // Dabg
00081     doc = QuantDabg::explainSelf();
00082     registerMethod(doc, &QuantDabg::newObject);
00083 
00084     // AvgDiff
00085     doc = QuantAvgDiff::explainSelf();
00086     registerMethod(doc, &QuantAvgDiff::newObject);
00087 
00088     // Median
00089     doc = QuantMedian::explainSelf();
00090     registerMethod(doc, &QuantMedian::newObject);
00091 
00092 
00093   }
00094   else if(type == GenoType) {
00095     // BRLMM
00096     SelfDoc doc = QuantBRLMM::explainSelf();
00097     registerMethod(doc, &QuantBRLMM::newObject);
00098 
00099     // BRLMM-P
00100     doc = QuantLabelZ::explainSelf();
00101     registerMethod(doc, &QuantLabelZ::newObject);
00102 
00103     // BRLMM-P-MULTI
00104     doc = QuantLabelZMulti::explainSelf();
00105     registerMethod(doc, &QuantLabelZMulti::newObject);
00106 
00107     // Original Birdseed (v1)
00108     doc = QuantBirdseedv1::explainSelf();
00109     registerMethod(doc, &QuantBirdseedv1::newObject);
00110 
00111     // Broad Birdseed Sandbox
00112     doc = QuantBirdseedDev::explainSelf();
00113     registerMethod(doc, &QuantBirdseedDev::newObject);
00114 
00115     // Broad Birdseed v2
00116     doc = QuantBirdseedv2::explainSelf();
00117     registerMethod(doc, &QuantBirdseedv2::newObject);
00118 
00119     // Legacy alias of "birdseed" to "birdseed-v1"
00120     doc = QuantBirdseedLegacy::explainSelf();
00121     registerMethod(doc, &QuantBirdseedLegacy::newObject);
00122 
00123   }
00124   else {
00125     Err::errAbort("QuantMethodFactory() - Don't recognize type: " + ToStr(type));
00126   }
00127 }

00131  * they describe themselves.

00133 QuantMethodFactory::QuantMethodFactory() {
00134   m_PrecompFeatureEffects = NULL;
00135   m_iFeatureEffectSize = 0;
00136   // Plier
00137   SelfDoc doc = QuantPlier::explainSelf();
00138   registerMethod(doc, &QuantPlier::newObject);
00139   
00140   // Sea
00141   doc = QuantSea::explainSelf();
00142   registerMethod(doc, &QuantSea::newObject);
00143   
00144   // IterPlier
00145   doc = QuantIterPlier::explainSelf();
00146   registerMethod(doc, &QuantIterPlier::newObject);
00147   
00148   // Rma
00149   doc = QuantRma::explainSelf();
00150   registerMethod(doc, &QuantRma::newObject);
00151   
00152   // Dabg
00153   doc = QuantDabg::explainSelf();
00154   registerMethod(doc, &QuantDabg::newObject);
00155   
00156   // AvgDiff
00157   doc = QuantAvgDiff::explainSelf();
00158   registerMethod(doc, &QuantAvgDiff::newObject);
00159   
00160   // Median
00161   doc = QuantMedian::explainSelf();
00162   registerMethod(doc, &QuantMedian::newObject);
00163   
00164   // BRLMM
00165   doc = QuantBRLMM::explainSelf();
00166   registerMethod(doc, &QuantBRLMM::newObject);
00167   
00168   // BRLMM-P
00169   doc = QuantLabelZ::explainSelf();
00170   registerMethod(doc, &QuantLabelZ::newObject);
00171   
00172   // BRLMM-P-MULTI
00173   doc = QuantLabelZMulti::explainSelf();
00174   registerMethod(doc, &QuantLabelZMulti::newObject);
00175   
00176   // Original Birdseed (v1)
00177   doc = QuantBirdseedv1::explainSelf();
00178   registerMethod(doc, &QuantBirdseedv1::newObject);
00179   
00180   // Broad Birdseed Sandbox
00181   doc = QuantBirdseedDev::explainSelf();
00182   registerMethod(doc, &QuantBirdseedDev::newObject);
00183   
00184   // Broad Birdseed v2
00185   doc = QuantBirdseedv2::explainSelf();
00186   registerMethod(doc, &QuantBirdseedv2::newObject);
00187   
00188   // Legacy alias of "birdseed" to "birdseed-v1"
00189   doc = QuantBirdseedLegacy::explainSelf();
00190   registerMethod(doc, &QuantBirdseedLegacy::newObject);
00191   
00192 }

00195 QuantMethodFactory::~QuantMethodFactory()
00196 {
00197 //      Verbose::out(3, "QuantMethodfactory is being destroyed.");      
00198         if (m_PrecompFeatureEffects != NULL) {delete[] m_PrecompFeatureEffects; m_PrecompFeatureEffects = NULL;}
00199 }

00201 /** 
00202  * @brief Create a pointer to a new QuantMethod object as described
00203  * in the string specification.
00204  * @param spec - Specification string i.e. quant-norm.sketch=1000000
00205  * 
00206  * @return Pointer to new QuantMethod objects, must be deleted when
00207  * finished.
00208  */
00209 QuantMethod *QuantMethodFactory::qMethodForString(const std::string &spec) {
00210   QuantMethod *stream = NULL;
00211   SelfCreate *create = NULL;
00212   create = SelfCreate::selfCreateFromString(spec, m_Docs, m_Creators, "QuantMethod");
00213   /* Check class type. */
00214   if(InstanceOf(create, QuantMethod)) {
00215     stream = static_cast<QuantMethod *>(create);
00216   }
00217   else {
00218     Err::errAbort("Class doesn't appear to be of type QuantMethod.");
00219   }
00220   return stream;
00221 }
00222 
00223 
00224 /** 
00225  * @brief Factory for creating QuantMethod from string representation.
00226  * 
00227  * @param spec - Name of QuantMethod.
00228  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00229  * 
00230  * @return Quantification method requested.
00231  */
00232 QuantMethod *QuantMethodFactory::quantMethodForString(string &spec, ChipLayout &layout, QuantType type) {
00233   QuantMethodFactory qFactory(type);
00234   QuantMethod *qMethod = NULL;
00235   qMethod = qFactory.qMethodForString(spec);
00236   assert(qMethod);
00237   /* Some post processing for specific objects. */
00238   if(InstanceOf(qMethod, QuantIterPlier)) {
00239     vector<int> iters;
00240     iters.push_back(22);
00241     iters.push_back(11);
00242     static_cast<QuantIterPlier *>(qMethod)->setIterations(iters);
00243   }
00244   else if(InstanceOf(qMethod, QuantDabg)) {
00245     if(m_GcControlProbes.empty()) {
00246       Err::errAbort("Must specify background probes when using dabg.");
00247     }
00248     static_cast<QuantDabg *>(qMethod)->setBgProbes(m_GcControlProbes);
00249     static_cast<QuantDabg *>(qMethod)->setGcProbes(layout.getGcProbeVec());
00250   }
00251   else if(InstanceOf(qMethod, QuantPlier) && m_PrecompFeatureEffects != NULL) {
00252     Verbose::out(1, "Setting quant plier with " + ToStr(layout.m_PlFactory.getApidMax()) + " feature effects.");
00253     static_cast<QuantPlier *>(qMethod)->setFeaturePriorEffects(m_PrecompFeatureEffects, m_iFeatureEffectSize);
00254   }
00255   else if(InstanceOf(qMethod, QuantRma) && m_PrecompFeatureEffects != NULL) {
00256     Verbose::out(1, "Setting quant rma with " + ToStr(layout.m_PlFactory.getApidMax()) + " feature effects.");
00257     static_cast<QuantRma *>(qMethod)->setFeaturePriorEffects(m_PrecompFeatureEffects, m_iFeatureEffectSize);
00258   }
00259   else if(!InstanceOf(qMethod, QuantMethod)) {
00260     Err::errAbort("QuantMethodFactory::quantMethodForString() - spec '" 
00261                   + spec + "' didn't result in a QuantMethod.");
00262   }
00263   return qMethod;
00264 }
00265 
00266 /** 
00267  * @brief Factory for creating QuantMethod from string representation.
00268  * 
00269  * @param spec - Name of QuantMethod.
00270  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00271  * 
00272  * @return Quantification method requested.
00273  */
00274 QuantMethod *QuantMethodFactory::quantMethodForString(const string &spec, PsBoard &board, QuantType type) {
00275   QuantMethodFactory qFactory(type);
00276   QuantMethod *qMethod = NULL;
00277   qMethod = qFactory.qMethodForString(spec);
00278   assert(qMethod);
00279   /* Some post processing for specific objects. */
00280   qMethod->setParameters(board);
00281   return qMethod;
00282 }

00294   qMethod = qMethodForString(spec);
00295   assert(qMethod);
00296   /* Some post processing for specific objects. */
00297   qMethod->setParameters(board);
00298   return qMethod;
00299 }

00301 /** 
00302  * @brief Factory for creating QuantMethod from string representation.
00303  * 
00304  * @param spec - Name of QuantMethod.
00305  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00306  * 
00307  * @return Quantification method requested.
00308  */
00309 QuantExprMethod *QuantMethodFactory::quantExprMethodForString(string &spec, ChipLayout &layout, QuantType type) {
00310   QuantMethod *qMethod = quantMethodForString(spec, layout, type);
00311   QuantExprMethod *qeMethod = NULL;
00312   assert(qMethod);
00313   qeMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantExprMethod *>(qMethod);
00314   if(qeMethod == NULL) 
00315     Err::errAbort("QuantMethodFactory::quantExprMethodForString() - " + qMethod->getType() + " doens't appear to be a QuantExprMethod.");
00316   return qeMethod;
00317 }

00319 /** 
00320  * @brief Factory for creating genotyping QuantMethod from string
00321  * representation.
00322  * 
00323  * @param spec - Name of QuantMethod.
00324  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00325  * 
00326  * @return Quantification method requested.
00327  */
00328 QuantGTypeMethod *QuantMethodFactory::quantGTypeMethodForString(string &spec, ChipLayout &layout, QuantType type) {
00329   QuantMethod *qMethod = quantMethodForString(spec, layout, type);
00330   QuantGTypeMethod *gtMethod = NULL;
00331   gtMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantGTypeMethod *>(qMethod);
00332   if(gtMethod == NULL) 
00333     Err::errAbort("QuantMethodFactory::quantGTypeMethodForString() - " + qMethod->getType() + " doens't appear to be a QuantGTypeMethod.");
00334   return gtMethod;
00335 }

00337 /** 
00338  * Open a file and read the precomputed probe effects to use in plier
00339  * from it. File must be tab delimited and contain the columns: "probeset_id",
00340  * "probe_id", and "feature_response"
00341  * 
00342  * @param fileName - Path to file containing probe effects.
00343  * @param effects - Map of probe ids to probe effects to be filled in.
00344  * @param opts - Options used in filling in.
00345  */
00346 int QuantMethodFactory::openPrecompFeatureEffects(     const std::string& fileName, 
00347                                                         double* effects, 
00348                                                         const ChipLayout &layout) {
00349   TsvFile tsv;
00350 
00351   std::string probeset_id; 
00352   int probe_id=0;
00353   double feature_response=0.0;
00354   int allele_id=0;
00355   int context_id=0;
00356   int channel_id=0;
00357   int probe_count = 0;
00358 
00359   bool oldStyleFeatureEffectsFile=false;
00360 
00361   tsv.open(fileName);
00362 
00363   if(tsv.cname2cidx(0, "channel_id") == TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND)
00364   { 
00365     oldStyleFeatureEffectsFile = true;
00366 
00367     tsv.bind(0,"probeset_id",     &probeset_id,           affx::TSV_BIND_OPTIONAL);
00368     tsv.bind(0,"probe_id",        &probe_id,              affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00369     tsv.bind(0,"feature_response",&feature_response,      affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00370    } else
00371    {  
00372     tsv.bind(0,"probeset_id",     &probeset_id,           affx::TSV_BIND_OPTIONAL);
00373     tsv.bind(0,"probe_id",        &probe_id,              affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00374     tsv.bind(0,"feature_response",&feature_response,      affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00375     tsv.bind(0,"allele_id",       &allele_id,             affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00376     tsv.bind(0,"context_id",      &context_id,            affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00377     tsv.bind(0,"channel_id",      &channel_id,            affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00378    } 
00379   if (tsv.formatOk()!=TSV_OK) {
00380     Err::errAbort(ToStr("Feature effect file ") + fileName + 
00381                   ToStr(" must have both 'probe_id' and 'feature_response' columns."));
00382   }
00383   
00384   while (tsv.nextLevel(0)==TSV_OK) {
00385     int featureEffectsId=0;
00386 
00387     if(oldStyleFeatureEffectsFile)
00388     {
00389       featureEffectsId = layout.findProbeApidByProbeId( probe_id-1 );
00390 
00391     } else
00392     { 
00393       featureEffectsId = layout.m_PlFactory.findProbeApidByName(probeset_id, 
00394                                                                 probe_id-1, 
00395                                                                 allele_id, 
00396                                                                 context_id, 
00397                                                                 channel_id);
00398    }
00399     if(featureEffectsId!=-1)
00400     {
00401       if (effects[featureEffectsId] != 0.0)
00402       {
00403         Err::errAbort("Duplicate feature effects for same probe found in feature effects file.");
00404       } else 
00405       {
00406         effects[featureEffectsId]=feature_response;
00407       }
00408     } else
00409     {
00410       static int warnCount = 0;
00411       warnCount++;
00412       if(warnCount < 10) {
00413         Verbose::out(2, "Some feature effects have been found for probes in the probeset: " + probeset_id + " that do not appear in the spf/cdf file.  Please check the compatibility of the spf/cdf and feature effects files.");
00414       }
00415       if(warnCount == 10) {
00416           Verbose::out(3, "More feature effects found which are not in library files. Only reporting first 10.");
00417       }
00418     }    
00419     probe_count++;
00420   }
00421   tsv.close();
00422   return probe_count;
00423 }
00424 
00425 int QuantMethodFactory::openPrecompFeatureEffects_A5(affx::File5_Group* group5,
00426                                                       const std::string& fileName,
00427                                                       double* effects,
00428                                                       const ChipLayout &layout) 
00429 {
00430 
00431   std::string probeset_id;
00432   int probe_id=0;
00433   double feature_response=0.0;
00434   int allele_id=0;
00435   int context_id=0;
00436   int channel_id=0;
00437   int probe_count = 0;
00438 
00439   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv(fileName,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00440   int oldStyleFeatureEffectsFileFlag = tsv5->getColumnIdx(0, "channel_id");
00441   while (tsv5->nextLevel(0)==affx::FILE5_OK) {
00442     int fileReadFlag1=0;
00443     int fileReadFlag2=0;
00444     if(oldStyleFeatureEffectsFileFlag == -1)
00445     {
00446 
00447       fileReadFlag1 = tsv5->get(0,"probe_id",        &probe_id);
00448       fileReadFlag2 = tsv5->get(0,"feature_response",&feature_response);
00449 
00450     } else
00451     {
00452       fileReadFlag1 = tsv5->get(0,"probe_id",        &probe_id);
00453       fileReadFlag2 = tsv5->get(0,"feature_response",&feature_response);
00454       tsv5->get(0,"probeset_id",      &probeset_id);
00455       tsv5->get(0,"allele_id",        &allele_id);
00456       tsv5->get(0,"context_id",       &context_id);
00457       tsv5->get(0,"channel_id",       &channel_id);
00458     }
00459 
00460     if (fileReadFlag1 == -1 || fileReadFlag2 == -1) {
00461       Err::errAbort(ToStr("Feature effect file ") + fileName +
00462                   ToStr(" must have both 'probe_id' and 'feature_response' columns."));
00463     }
00464     int featureEffectsId=0;
00465     if(oldStyleFeatureEffectsFileFlag == -1)
00466     {
00467       featureEffectsId = layout.findProbeApidByProbeId(TO_ZEROBASED(probe_id));
00468     } else
00469     {
00470 
00471       featureEffectsId = layout.m_PlFactory.findProbeApidByName(probeset_id, 
00472                                                                 probe_id-1, 
00473                                                                 allele_id, 
00474                                                                 context_id, 
00475                                                                 channel_id);
00476     } 
00477     if(featureEffectsId!=-1)
00478     {
00479       if (effects[featureEffectsId] != 0.0)
00480       {
00481         Err::errAbort("Duplicate feature effects for same probe found in feature effects file.");
00482       } else
00483       {
00484         effects[featureEffectsId]=feature_response;
00485       }
00486     } else
00487     {
00488       static int warnCount = 0;
00489       warnCount++;
00490       if(warnCount < 10) {
00491         Verbose::out(2, "Some feature effects have been found for probes in the probeset: " + probeset_id + " that do not appear in the spf/cdf file.  Please check the compatibility of the spf/cdf and feature effects files.");
00492       }
00493       if(warnCount == 10) {
00494           Verbose::out(3, "More feature effects found which are not in library files. Only reporting first 10.");
00495       }
00496 
00497     }
00498     probe_count++;
00499   }  // end while
00500 
00501   tsv5->close();
00502   delete tsv5;
00503   return probe_count;
00504 }
00505 
00506   /** 
00507    * Read the feature responses from a file. File should have columns
00508    * for 'probeset_id', 'probe_id' and 'feature_response'.
00509    * 
00510    * @param fileName - text file with feature responses.
00511    */
00512 const void QuantMethodFactory::readPrecompFeatureEffectsFromFile(       int iProbeCount,
00513                                                                         const std::string& fileName,
00514                                                                         const ChipLayout &layout) {
00515     int probe_count = 0;
00516     if (m_PrecompFeatureEffects != NULL)
00517     {
00518       delete[] m_PrecompFeatureEffects;
00519       m_PrecompFeatureEffects = NULL;
00520     }
00521     iProbeCount = layout.m_PlFactory.getApidMax();
00522     m_PrecompFeatureEffects = new double[iProbeCount];
00523     m_iFeatureEffectSize = iProbeCount;
00524     memset(m_PrecompFeatureEffects, 0, sizeof(double) * iProbeCount);
00525     probe_count = openPrecompFeatureEffects(fileName, m_PrecompFeatureEffects, layout);
00526     Verbose::out(1, "Loaded " + ToStr(probe_count) + " feature effects.");
00527   }
00528 
00529 
00530   void QuantMethodFactory::readPrecompFeatureEffectsFrom_A5(    int iProbeCount,
00531                                                                 affx::File5_Group* group5,
00532                                                                 const std::string& name,
00533                                                                 const ChipLayout &layout) {
00534     int probe_count = 0;
00535     if (m_PrecompFeatureEffects != NULL)
00536     {
00537       delete[] m_PrecompFeatureEffects; 
00538       m_PrecompFeatureEffects = NULL;
00539     }
00540     iProbeCount = layout.m_PlFactory.getApidMax();
00541     m_PrecompFeatureEffects = new double[iProbeCount];
00542     m_iFeatureEffectSize = iProbeCount;
00543     memset(m_PrecompFeatureEffects, 0, sizeof(double) * iProbeCount);
00544     probe_count = openPrecompFeatureEffects_A5(group5,name,m_PrecompFeatureEffects, layout);
00545     Verbose::out(1, "Loaded " + ToStr(probe_count) + " feature effects. (A5)");
00546   }
00547 
00548 
00549 void QuantMethodFactory::setupQuantMethodFactory(
00550         QuantMethodFactory &qFactory,
00551         affx::File5_File * inputFile,
00552         affx::File5_Group * inputGroup,
00553         affx::File5_File * outputFile,
00554         affx::File5_Group * outputGroup,
00555         uint32_t probeCount,
00556         const std::string &outDir,
00557         const std::string &useFeatEff,
00558         bool a5FeatureEffectsInputGlobal,
00559         const std::string &a5FeatureEffectsInputFile,
00560         const std::string &a5FeatureEffectsInputName,
00561         const std::string &a5FeatureEffectsInputGroup,
00562         const std::string &a5InputGroup,
00563         const std::string &a5Group,
00564         const std::string &setAnalysisName,
00565         const std::string &quantMethodSpec,
00566         const ChipLayout &layout
00567      ) {
00568   if(useFeatEff != "") {
00569     qFactory.readPrecompFeatureEffectsFromFile(probeCount, useFeatEff, layout);
00570   } else if (a5FeatureEffectsInputGlobal || a5FeatureEffectsInputFile != "") {
00571     string groupName = "/";
00572     string dataName = "feature-response";
00573     if(a5FeatureEffectsInputName != "") {
00574         dataName = a5FeatureEffectsInputName;
00575     } else if(setAnalysisName != "") {
00576         dataName = setAnalysisName + ".feature-response";
00577     } else {
00578         ///@todo this should really be based on the analysis name which means
00579         ///      that this functionality needs to be in a QuantMethod instance
00580         ///      and not in the factory
00581         dataName = "feature-response";
00582     }
00583     if(a5FeatureEffectsInputGroup != "") 
00584         groupName = a5FeatureEffectsInputGroup;
00585     else if(a5InputGroup != "") 
00586         groupName = a5InputGroup;
00587     else if(a5Group != "") 
00588         groupName = a5Group;
00589 
00590     if (a5FeatureEffectsInputGlobal) {
00591         Verbose::out(1,"Loading feat effects from global A5 file, group '" + groupName + "', data '" + dataName + "'");
00592         if(inputFile == NULL)
00593             Err::errAbort("--a5-feature-effects-input-global option given, but no global input file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
00594         affx::File5_Group *a5group = inputFile->openGroup(groupName,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00595         qFactory.readPrecompFeatureEffectsFrom_A5(probeCount, a5group, dataName, layout);
00596         a5group->close();
00597         Freez(a5group);
00598     } else if (a5FeatureEffectsInputFile!="") {
00599         Verbose::out(1,"Loading feature effects from '" + a5FeatureEffectsInputFile + "' A5 file, group '" + groupName + "', data '" + dataName + "'");
00600         affx::File5_File  *a5file = new affx::File5_File();
00601         a5file->open(a5FeatureEffectsInputFile,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00602         affx::File5_Group *a5group = a5file->openGroup(groupName,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00603         qFactory.readPrecompFeatureEffectsFrom_A5(probeCount, a5group, dataName, layout);
00604         a5group->close();
00605         Freez(a5group);
00606         a5file->close();
00607         Freez(a5file);
00608     }
00609   }
00610 }
